code: import axios from'axios';var ChatListRequest=function ChatListRequest(){return{type:'CHATLIST_REQUEST'};};var ChatListSuccess=function ChatListSuccess(data){return{type:'CHATLIST_SUCCESS',payload:data};};var ChatListError=function ChatListError(err){return{type:'CHATLIST_ERROR',payload:err};};export var ChatList=function ChatList(userToken,id){return function(dispatch){dispatch(ChatListRequest());return axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"chats/").concat(id),{headers:{'user-token':userToken}}).then(function(res){dispatch(ChatListSuccess(res.data));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(ChatListError(err));});};};
